*PROCEED WITH CAUTION*

= Unroot your Phone / Place Phone Back to Stock =

1 Download the _DREAIMG.nbh_: http://android-roms.googlecode.com/files/DREAIMG-RC29.zip<br>
2 Place "_DREAIMG.nbh_" on the root of your SD card.<br>
3 Turn your phone off.<br>
4 Start up in bootloader mode by holding Camera and pressing Power.<br>
5 Hit power button to start the update.<br>
6 Once the install completes hit action(trackball down) and your phone will reboot.<br>
<br>
_- You now have the stock RC29 firmware, now it will update on it's own in a bit -_
